alert.note: Alert for Goliad; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 2:25AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Victoria and northeastern Goliad Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 224 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ander, or 10 miles northeast of Goliad, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Victoria, Goliad, Guadalupe, Fannin, Victoria Colony Creek Country Club, Weesatche, Weser, Nursery, Victoria Riverside Park, Victoria College, Victoria Mall, Saxet Lakes, Brentwood Subdivision, Inez, Salem, Telferner, Downtown Victoria, Fordtran, Schroeder and Ander. This includes the following highways... US Highway 183 between mile markers 628 and 640. US Highway 59 between mile markers 624 and 656. US Highway 77 between mile markers 560 and 584. US Highway 87 between mile markers 798 and 818. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for south central Texas.
